primevc.core.IBindableReadonly

type
interface
implements
primevc.core.traits.IValueObject
Read-only interface for 'data-binding'.

Instance Variables

change(default,null) : primevc.core.dispatcher.Signal2<DataTypeOldValue<DataType>>

Dispatched just before "value" is set to a new value. Signal argument: The new value.

value(default,null) : DataType

Instance Methods

unbind(otherBindable : IBindableReadonly<DataType>) : Bool

returns
true when a connection was removed
Remove any connections between this IChangeNotifier and 'otherBindable'
